info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued July 13 at 1:19PM EDT until July 13 at 4:15PM EDT by NWS Baltimore MD/Washington DC
info.description:
At 119 PM EDT, Doppler radar indicated thunderstorms producing heavy rain across the warned area. Between 2 and 4 inches of rain have fallen. The expected rainfall rate is 1 to 2 inches in 30 minutes. Additional rainfall amounts of 1 to 2 inches are possible in the warned area. Flash flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly.
HAZARD...Life threatening flash flooding. Thunderstorms producing flash flooding.
SOURCE...Radar.
IMPACT...Life threatening flash flooding of creeks and streams, urban areas, highways, streets and underpasses.
Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Bladensburg... Gallaudet University... Fort Totten... Howard University... Landover... Hyattsville... East Riverdale... Riverdale Park... Cheverly... Greater Landover... Chillum... Mount Rainier... Brentwood... University Park... Edmonston... Colmar Manor... Cottage City... North Brentwood... National Arboretum... Catholic University...
info.instruction: Turn around, don't drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.

parameter.value: FLASH FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 415 PM EDT THIS AFTERNOON FOR THE CENTRAL DISTRICT OF COLUMBIA AND PRINCE GEORGES COUNTY
NWS: FLASH FLOOD WARNING this area til 4:15 PM EDT. Avoid flooded areas.

National Weather Service: A FLASH FLOOD WARNING is in effect for this area until 4:15 PM EDT. This is a dangerous and life-threatening situation. Do not attempt to travel unless you are fleeing an area subject to flooding or under an evacuation order.

area.areaDesc: District of Columbia, DC; Prince Georges, MD

parameter.value: FLASH FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 415 PM EDT THIS AFTERNOON FOR THE CENTRAL DISTRICT OF COLUMBIA AND PRINCE GEORGES COUNTY
SNM: AVISO DE INUNDACIONES REPENTINAS hasta 4:15 PM EDT. Evite areas inundadas.

Servicio Nacional de Meteorologia: AVISO DE INUNDACIONES REPENTINAS en efecto para esta area hasta las 4:15 PM EDT. Esta es una situacion peligrosa y amenaza la vida. No intente viajar a menos que sea para abandonar un area propensa a inundaciones o bajo una orden de desalojo.
